userBehavior.title: Understand User Behavior
userBehavior.description: We analyze how people move through spaces, observing traffic patterns, identifying bottlenecks, and addressing diverse user needs, including those with visual or mobility impairments.
userBehavior.sectionTitle: User Behavior Analysis with 360 Virtual Tours
userBehavior.sectionDescription: Our 360 camera captures detailed virtual tours to study user movement and optimize navigation in complex environments like airports and hospitals.
userBehavior.video1Caption: Analyzing passenger flow in an international airport.
userBehavior.video2Caption: Studying patient and visitor movement in a hospital.

clarityConsistency.title: Design for Clarity and Consistency
clarityConsistency.description: Our signage is readable, well-placed, and consistent in style, using colors, graphics, and architectural elements to create recognizable areas and simplify navigation.
clarityConsistency.sectionDescription: We create signage with architectural plans to ensure clarity and consistency across public spaces, enhancing user experience.
clarityConsistency.image1Caption: Signage layout for an international airport.
clarityConsistency.image2Caption: Consistent signage design for a mall.

visualCues.title: Leverage Visual Cues and Landmarks
visualCues.description: We create memorable landmarks and clear directional cues, both verbal and visual, to guide users and highlight points of interest within the space.
visualCues.sectionDescription: Our signage totems and landmarks provide intuitive navigation cues for users in complex environments.
visualCues.image1Caption: Interactive totem in an airport terminal.
visualCues.image2Caption: Prominent landmark in a shopping mall.
visualCues.image3Caption: Clear directional cues in a hospital.

accessibility.title: Ensure Accessibility
accessibility.description: We design for all users, incorporating features for individuals with disabilities and exploring digital tools like apps and maps to enhance navigation.
accessibility.sectionDescription: Our navigation app and signage designs prioritize accessibility for aged adults and individuals with disabilities.
accessibility.feature1: Voice-guided navigation for visually impaired users.
accessibility.feature2: High-contrast, large-font displays for aged adults.
accessibility.image2Caption: Signage with braille and high-contrast text.

maintenance.title: Maintain and Update
maintenance.description: We regularly evaluate and update wayfinding systems to ensure effectiveness and consistency across locations, keeping navigation seamless.
maintenance.sectionDescription: Our maintenance services ensure signage remains functional and up-to-date in dynamic environments.
